title-part.text: DOMESTIC STOVES OR RANGES FOR SOLID FUELS

reference.text: for solid fuels in combination with gaseous fuels, liquid fuels or other kinds of energy supply F24C1/02

title-part.text: IMPLEMENTS FOR USE IN CONNECTION WITH STOVES OR RANGES

CPC-specific-text.text: on which a removable cooking element is arranged

note.note-paragraph:
Groups F24B1/04 and F24B1/06 are incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups F24B1/08, F24B1/10, F24B1/14, and F24B1/16.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Construction of tiles or bracing means therefor, e.g. shim liner
with fuel storage in a single undivided hopper within stove or range

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24B1/08 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24B1/04 and F24B1/06.
Groups F24B1/08, F24B1/04, and F24B1/06 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

reference.text: with predistillation in the hopper F24B1/14

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24B1/10 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24B1/04 and F24B1/06.
Groups F24B1/10, F24B1/04, and F24B1/06 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F24B1/14 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24B1/04 and F24B1/06.
Groups F24B1/14, F24B1/04, and F24B1/06 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with fuel storage in multiple or divided hoppers within the stove or range

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24B1/16 is impacted by reclassification into groups F24B1/04 and F24B1/06.
Groups F24B1/16, F24B1/04, and F24B1/06 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Stoves with open fires, e.g. fireplaces

CPC-specific-text.text: adapted for the use of both solid fuel and another type of fuel or energy supply

reference.text: for stoves without open fires F24C1/02

CPC-specific-text.text: Mounting of closed stoves in a fireplace

title-part.text: Free-standing fireplaces, e.g. for mobile homes
with additional provisions for heating water
with air-handling means, heat exchange means, or additional provisions for convection heating

reference.text: with additional provisions for heating water F24B1/183; component parts or accessories having air-handling means, heat exchange means, or additional provisions for convection heating F24B1/191

title-part.text: Condition responsive controls for regulating combustion
characterised by use of heat exchange means

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. using a particular heat exchange medium, e.g. oil, gas

reference.text: condition responsive controls for regulating combustion F24B1/187

CPC-specific-text.text: the heat exchange medium being either water or air
the heat exchange medium being both water and air
the heat exchange medium being air only
the heat exchanger comprising only tubular air ducts within the fire

title-part.text: characterised by air-handling means, i.e. of combustion-air, heated-air, or flue-gases, e.g. draught control dampers

reference.text: condition responsive controls for regulating combustion F24B1/187; by use of heat exchange means F24B1/188

CPC-specific-text.text: in combination with provisions for heating air only
in combination with provisions for heating water only
in combination with provisions for heating both air and water

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24B1/191 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups F24B13/00 and F24B13/002.
Groups F24B13/00, F24B13/002, and F24B1/191 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: in which the baking oven is arranged above the fire-box
with built-in masses for heat storage or heat insulation
Stoves with additional provisions for cooking

reference.text: stoves with open-fires with additional provisions for cooking F24B1/182

title-part.text: Combined installations of stoves or ranges, e.g. back-to-back stoves with a common fire-box
Heaters not covered by group F24B1/00, e.g. charcoal braziers
Combustion-air or flue-gas circulation in or around stoves or ranges

reference.text: stoves with open fires with air-handling means F24B1/185

CPC-specific-text.text: Supply of primary air for combustion
Supply of secondary air for completing combustion of fuel
Supply of primary and secondary air for combustion
Arrangements combining combustion-air and flue-gas circulation

title-part.text: the air or gas passing downwards through the bottom of the stove of fire grate

CPC-specific-text.text: the oven in arranged under the fire-box

title-part.text: Stoves, ranges or flue-gas ducts, with additional provisions for convection heating

reference.text: stoves with open fires characterised by use of heat exchange means F24B1/188

CPC-specific-text.text: Stoves or ranges with additional provisions for heating both air and water

title-part.text: Stoves, ranges or flue-gas ducts, with additional provisions for heating water

reference.text: stoves with open fires with additional provisions for cooking F24B1/182; for heating water F24B1/183

title-part.text: Details solely applicable to stoves or ranges burning solid fuels

reference.text: component parts or accessories for stoves with open-fires F24B1/191

note.note-paragraph:
Group F24B13/00 is impacted by reclassification into group F24B1/191.
Groups F24B13/00 and F24B1/191 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group F24B13/002 is impacted by reclassification into group F24B1/191.
Groups F24B13/002 and F24B1/191 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Doors specially adapted for stoves or ranges
Arrangements for cleaning, e.g. soot removal; Ash removal

title-part.text: Arrangement or mountings of fire-grate assemblies
Arrangement or mountings of linings for fire-boxes, e.g. fire-backs
Arrangements for feeding solid fuel, e.g. hoppers
Implements for use in connection with stoves or ranges
